story:
Once upon a time, in the vibrant country of Mexico, there was a little boy named Mateo. Mateo was a curious and brave little boy who loved exploring the world around him.

One evening, Mateo's abuelita sat him down and told him about the magical legend of the Quetzal bird. She told him that the Quetzal bird was the most beautiful bird in all of Mexico, with shimmering green and red feathers. The bird was said to bring good luck and happiness to those who saw it.

Mateo's abuelita whispered to him that if he closed his eyes and made a wish before falling asleep, the Quetzal bird might just come to visit him in his dreams.

Excited by the prospect of meeting this wondrous bird, Mateo closed his eyes tightly and made a wish for a world filled with love and kindness.

As he drifted off to sleep, Mateo found himself in a lush forest filled with colorful flowers and tall trees. And there, perched on a branch right in front of him, was the magnificent Quetzal bird. Its feathers shimmered in the sunlight, casting a magical glow all around.

The Quetzal bird spoke to Mateo in a gentle voice, telling him that his wish for a world full of love and kindness was already within his reach. All he had to do was spread kindness wherever he went, just like the Quetzal bird brought joy to everyone who saw it.

Filled with inspiration and gratitude, Mateo woke up the next morning feeling a warm sense of joy in his heart. From that day on, he made it his mission to spread love and kindness to all those around him, just like the Quetzal bird had taught him in his dream.

And so, Mateo lived his life with a kind and open heart, always remembering the magical night he met the Quetzal bird and the important lesson it had taught him about the power of kindness and love.

And as Mateo drifted off to sleep every night, he knew that the Quetzal bird would always be watching over him, bringing him peace and happiness in his dreams.

And they all lived happily ever after. The end. 

Goodnight, sweet dreams, and may the Quetzal bird always guide you towards a world filled with love and kindness. Buenas noches, my dear child.
